attributes.action: look into broadband companies that are not giving the speeds people pay for
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why internet users are not getting a fair deal.
1 are you getting the speed you pay for.
2 does your provider have a premium rate help line.
3 Are you kept on the phone,and do not understand the person you are talking to.
4 Is your problem solved within 10 days.
